ADDWII Air map Knowledge About The air quality is normal, please keep it fresh. TVOC is low, no irritation or discomfort risk. The air quality is moderate. Avoid staying in this situation too long (12 months). Improved ventilation is recommended. The air quality is high pollution. Avoid staying in this situation too long (1 month). Intensified ventilation is recommended. The air quality is unhealthy. Avoid staying in this situation too long (Within hours). Intensified ventilation is necessary. The air quality is harmful. Please leave here. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. The air quality is hazardous. Please leave here immediately. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. Normally, Human feels cool and comfortable when the humidity percent range is about 45%~65%. Your body healthy cannot be afforded by too dry or too moist. Normally, the best temperature for human is about 64~77°F(18~25℃)
Normal Moderate High Unhealthy Harmful Hazardous The air quality is normal. The air quality is moderate. You may feel uncomfortable. Improved ventilation is recommended. The air quality is high pollution. Avoid staying in this situation too long. Intensified ventilation is recommended. The air quality is unhealthy. Avoid staying in this situation too long. Intensified ventilation is necessary. The air quality is harmful. Please leave here. Intensified ventilation is mandatory. The air quality is hazardous. Please leave here immediately. Intensified ventilation is mandatory.
Normal Moderate High Unhealthy Harmful Hazardous The air quality is normal. The air quality is moderate. The air quality is high pollution. Avoid staying in this situation too long. Sensitive people may feel uncomfortable. The air quality is unhealthy. Avoid staying in this situation too long. The air quality is harmful. Please leave here. The air quality is hazardous. Please leave here immediately. Stay too long may affect lung function or causing irregular heartbeat.

Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this demo.

Permission required nRF Toolbox would like to copy some sample applications, that may be uploaded onto your nRF51 device using the DFU (Device Firmware Update), to the memory of this device. If you agree, you will be asked to give the application permission to access files on your device. Permission denied. Device doesn\'t have BLE support! Link at least %d points, please reset. Not the same as the first time, please reset Yes NO The Device Firmware Update (DFU) app allows you to update the firmware of your Bluetooth Smart device over-the-air (OTA). It is compatible with Nordic Semiconductor nRF51822 or nRF51422 devices with S110 SoftDevice and DFU bootloader enabled. With SoftDevice s110 7.0.0+, the SoftDevice itself and/or a bootloader may also be updated. For more information about the DFU, see the About DFU section in Settings. "Starting from nRF Toolbox v1.12 the new Distribution packet (ZIP) is the recommended method for distributing firmware upgrades. \t\tYou can create the ZIP file using the nrf utility tool, which is part of Master Control Panel 3.8.0+. For more detailed information, see the DFU documentation. \t\t Backward compatibility \t\t The nRF Toolbox also supports all old file formats: HEX and BIN files, separate DAT files and ZIP files without a manifest file but with a fixed naming convention: " UPLOAD DEVICE FIRMWARE UPDATE File name: Type: Size: Scope: Status:

Firmware Update Ensure the device is connected to the charger and avoid shaking the device or your phone.\n Please note that this FW update process is done entirely at your own risk. If the failure occurs, please contact us at service@addwii.com Update now Ask me later Your Mobile Nose has already been updated to the last version. Please put your Mobile Nose connect to charger.
